name: MECHA SNAKE (itch)
description:
This game is almost like a classic Snake with only a little other mechanics. I made this game for My First Game Jam. 

  • Setting: mechanical keyboard
  • Graphic assets: mine
  • Background music: from internet
  • Audio effects: mine
  • Made with: Godot Engine

Controls:

  • WSAD
  • SPACE to pause
  • F to mute

I hope you like this game! If there is anything you think I could improve, please let me know!
